ProductDescLong: Modelo Negra Mexican Beer, the original Modelo, is a Munich Dunkel-style dark lager with rich flavor and a remarkably smooth taste. DigitalCatalogProductName: Ballast Point Variety Pack Craft Beer, 24 pk 12 fl oz Bottles, 7.1% ABV
ProductDescShort: Ballast Point IPA Mix Pack contains our gold-medal winning Sculpin IPA, Manta Ray Double IPA, Fathom IPA, and Grapefruit Sculpin. Craft beer brewed in San Diego, California since 1996.
ProductDescLong: What started as a small group of home brewers, who simply wanted to make a better beer, evolved into the adventurers known today as Ballast Point. Ballast Point IPA Mix Pack contains our gold-medal winning Sculpin IPA, an instant favorite from our R&D Program Manta Ray Double IPA, Fathom IPA, and Grapefruit Sculpin. Our Sculpin IPA has hints of apricot, peach, mango and lemon flavors with a slight sling, just like a Sculpin fish. Our Manta Ray Double IPA features fresh, citrusy tangerine, melon and pine aromas with a smooth finish. Our Fathom IPA features a touch of malt on the surface with an ocean of zesty orange and piney hops below. Grapefruit Sculpin is the latest take on Ballast Point's signature IPA, featuring the tart freshness of grapefruit, which perfectly complements the IPA's citrusy hop character. Craft beer brewed in San Diego, California since 1996. Best served chilled.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Funky Buddha Floridian Hefeweizen Craft Beer, 12 pk 12 fl oz Cans, 5.2% ABV
ProductDescShort: Funky Buddha Floridian Hefeweizen Craft Beer is an unfiltered German-style wheat beer with a slightly bitter flavor and aromas of bananas, citrus and cloves.
ProductDescLong: Funky Buddha Floridian Hefeweizen Craft Beer is an unfiltered and pleasant German-style wheat beer. Full of flavor but light on the palate, this Florida beer is made exactingly with natural ingredients. Authentic hefeweizen yeast gives this Funky Buddha beer compelling aromas of bananas, citrus and cloves. A hazy golden color reminiscent of a Florida sunset complements the full flavor of unfiltered beer. Pour this slightly bitter hefeweizen into a weizen glass and pair with mild or sharp goat cheeses, arugula salad with lemon vinaigrette, grilled shrimp, beer-battered onion rings with spicy aioli, whole wheat crust pizza or honey-drizzled baklava. Whether it's the quality of the ingredients, the caliber of the beer, or just watching a breathtaking Florida sunset, Funky Buddha is all about creating enlightening experiences through craft beers. Inner peace starts with great beer. Please drink responsibly. Floridian Wheat Beer.  Funky Buddha Brewery, Oakland, Park, FL

DigitalCatalogProductName: Four Corners El Chingon IPA Craft Beer, 6 pk 12 fl oz Cans, 7.3% ABV
ProductDescShort: Four Corners El Chingon India Pale Ale Craft Beer is made with seven types of American hops. This Texas beer shines with bitter yet pleasant earthy flavor that's perfect with pork or lamb.
ProductDescLong: Four Corners El Chingon India Pale Ale Craft Beer is a quintessentially American IPA. Hecho en Tejas with a combination of Columbus, Cascade and Centennial hops, this American beer is given a final kick of Falconer's Flight, 7C Blend at the end of its boil. That blend is packed full of additional Crystal, Columbus, Cluster, Citra, Chinook, Centennial and Cascade hops. A robust build of Munich malt and pale malt topped with Santiam leave this IPA beer fairly bitter yet pleasantly hoppy with plenty of flavor to go around. At 72 out of 100 International Bitterness Units, this Texas beer shines through its vibrant earthy and citrusy flavor. Bring this six pack of beer along to your next game day with friends. Pop open a can of El Chingon beer alongside rich dishes like pork or lamb. There are many IPAs, but only one can be called El Chingon. Brew great beer. Elevate beer culture. Drink Responsibly. Four Corners� Brewing Co., Dallas, TX

ProductDescLong: Modelo Negra Mexican Beer, the original Modelo, is a Munich Dunkel-style dark lager with rich flavor and a remarkably smooth taste. Made with galena and super galena hops, slow-roasted dark malt and non-malted cereals, this Mexican lager style beer is brewed longer than other import beer to enhance its flavors. This process results in a medium-bodied lager beer with 173 calories per serving, low hop bitterness and a surprisingly light finish that goes beyond expectations. Enjoy this easy-drinking beer on its own, or pair its deep cerveza flavor with Mexican dishes, grilled meats, sausages with roasted vegetables, washed-ring Munster cheese, candied ginger beer cake, shellfish or Asian food. Brewed since 1925, Modelo Negra is the beer that fights to defy expectations. Drink responsibly. Modelo Negra Beer. Imported by Crown Imports, Chicago, IL

ProductDescLong: Funky Buddha Floridian Hefeweizen Craft Beer is an unfiltered and pleasant German-style wheat beer. Full of flavor but light on the palate, this Florida beer is made exactingly with natural ingredients. Authentic hefeweizen yeast gives this Funky Buddha beer compelling aromas of bananas, citrus and cloves. A hazy golden color reminiscent of a Florida sunset complements the full flavor of unfiltered beer. Pour this slightly bitter hefeweizen into a weizen glass and pair with mild or sharp goat cheeses, arugula salad with lemon vinaigrette, grilled shrimp, beer-battered onion rings with spicy aioli, whole wheat crust pizza or honey-drizzled baklava. Whether it's the quality of the ingredients, the caliber of the beer, or just watching a breathtaking Florida sunset, Funky Buddha is all about creating enlightening experiences through craft beers. Inner peace starts with great beer. Please drink responsibly. Floridian Wheat Beer.  Funky Buddha Brewery, Oakland, Park, FL

ProductDescShort: Ruffino Modus Toscana Red Wine is full-bodied with a modern style and rich with silky tannins, making it the perfect addition to an elegant wine and cheese party.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Modus Toscana Red Wine weaves together vibrant fresh fruit flavors from sangiovese, cabernet sauvignon and merlot red grapes with finesse, each adding their own distinctive characteristics. Sangiovese lends texture, merlot works in smoothness and cabernet gives structure. This red wine blend is intriguing on the nose with initial aromas of mature red and black fruits, such as cherries, plums, and small black berries. These intense aromas are complemented by hints of spices, sweet tobacco and refined balsamic notes. Full-bodied with a modern style, this red wine blend is rich with silky tannins and a long finish of vanilla and red berry. Containing the best grapes from the Poggio Casciano estate, this Italian wine reveals itself without coaxing or manipulation. Pair a glass with duck and pancetta, beef-stuffed manicotti and aged cheeses. Store this bottle of wine at room temperature, but refrigerate for about 30 to 60 minutes before pouring a glass. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Franciscan Vineyard Signature Napa Valley Reserve Merlot, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Franciscan Napa Valley Reserve Merlot red wine has aromas of pretty berry, sweet cherry vanilla, and milk chocolate. Textured and rich, the flavors echo the aromas with anise, toffee and plum.
ProductDescLong: Founded in 1973, Franciscan has a long tradition of crafting wine with a highly meticulous approach. Franciscan's home estate is located in Oakville, right in the heart of the Napa Valley appellation. This 240-acre parcel of land features loamy, gravelly, well-draining soil which adds structure to the wines. At Franciscan Estate, the wine lots are kept separate from the vineyard until just before bottling. After picking by hand, every load of grapes is assigned its own tank. Franciscan Napa Valley Reserve Merlot red wine has aromas of pretty berry, sweet cherry vanilla, and milk chocolate. Soft and seamless, neatly woven with a velvety mouthfeel. Textured and rich, the flavors echo the aromas with anise, toffee and plum. Varietal: 93% merlot, 7% syrah.

ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Heritage Red Wine showcases ripe, fruit-forward flavors blended primarily from syrah and merlot grapes. This red blend opens with decadent aromas of chocolate-covered cherry, strawberry shortcake and vanilla bean. On the palate, flavors of strawberry preserves, raspberry tart, cherry cola and milk chocolate give way to soft tannins with a bright, lingering finish. Malolactic fermentation enhances this California wine's roundness and depth. Fruit from the Central Coast vineyards ripens slowly in the cool climate by the Pacific Ocean, encouraging complexity and depth of flavor. The phenomenal grapes ultimately become Central Coast wine of the utmost quality, offered at a more accessible price by Robert Mondavi Private Selection. Serve this full bodied red wine blend with a variety of spicy barbecue and Mexican dishes. Store at room temperature, but refrigerate this bottle of wine for about 30 to 60 minutes before pouring a glass, serving cool for optimal taste. ProductDescShort: SIMI Sonoma County Chardonnay White Wine is a California white wine with fresh flavors and a crisp and creamy finish. This food-friendly wine pairs well with seafood, salads, grilled pork and pasta.
ProductDescLong: SIMI Sonoma County Chardonnay White Wine is a food-friendly table white wine with expressive fruit flavors and aromas. Notes of tangerine, white peach, green apple, Meyer lemon and orange blossom combine with hints of butter, cream, vanilla and flint. Aged for eight months in French and American oak barrels, this California wine combines chardonnay grapes from the most prestigious regions of Sonoma County, producing zesty, fresh flavors of tangerine, lemon curd, stone fruit, white peach and nectarine that awaken the palate with every sip. This crisp white wine has a creamy finish with hints of orange peel and vanilla, making it the perfect companion to caprese salad, smoked salmon, prawns, poached halibut with salsa verde, tortellini alla panna, grilled pork loin with stone fruit compote or asparagus with hollandaise sauce and a soft poached egg. For best taste and quality, chill this luscious SIMI chardonnay for two to two and a half hours at around 50 degrees before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 SIMI Winery, Geyserville, CA

ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine is a flavorful medium-bodied wine with notes of berries, toasted marshmallow, chocolate and graham cracker. Premium grapes grown in the warm days and cools nights of the Central Valley give this California wine an excellent taste that pleases the palate on its own or with your favorite meal. This delicious red table wine pairs delightfully with grilled meats, seafood, chicken and tomato-based pasta dishes. Keep this cabernet sauvignon wine at room temperature, then chill for 30 to 60 minutes and serve at about 60 degrees. Crafted for over 30 years and perfect for every day. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Woodbridge Winery, Acampo, CA USA

ProductDisclaimerSparkling: SPARKLING WARNING: BE CAREFUL! Point bottle away from self and others to avoid serious eye injury.  Stopper may eject forcefully while you are removing the hood or at any time after hood removal.  Bottle contains high pressure which increases with warmth or shaking.  To open: (1) chill well, (2) do not shake, (3) point bottle away from self and others, (4) remove hood, (5) twist stopper out slowly by hand.  NEVER use a cork remover or reinsert stopper.

ProductDescShort: Cooper and Thief Bourbon Barrel Aged Dark Red Wine Blend comes in a convenient package with two whiskey glasses to give the gift of this rich and bold California red wine to your favorite connoisseur.
ProductDescLong: Cooper and Thief Bourbon Barrel Aged Dark Red Wine Blend is aged in bourbon barrels for three months, giving it a velvety mouthfeel with subtle heat. You can now give the gift of that bold taste in this convenient package, featuring two whiskey glasses in addition to a bottle of Cooper and Thief wine. Merlot, syrah, zinfandel, petite sirah and cabernet sauvignon collide in one bourbon barrel to create this dark and jammy wine, featuring true bourbon flavor. Crafted by Cellarmaster Jeff Kasavan, each taste of this California red wine gives way to hints of dark fruit and vanilla. This dark red wine gets its unique taste from varietals found across California's prime winegrowing regions. Present this wine gift to a friend who needs a burst of flavor with their next lamb or chicken dinner. The barrel aging gives this wine soft tannins that deliver a full-bodied and lingering finish in each sip. Born from mischief, Cooper and Thief Wine celebrates doing things differently. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Cooper & Thief Cellarmasters, Lodi, CA USA.

ProductDescShort: Kim Crawford Rose Wine in cans is light, refreshing, and easy to drink. The lively aroma and rich flavors of strawberry and melons make this portable wine can an ideal aperitif or summer sipper.
ProductDescLong: Light and refreshing, Kim Crawford Rose Wine in cans has a lively nose that brims with bright berry and tropical fruit. Richly flavored with hints of strawberry and watermelon, this vibrantly colored pink wine is the ideal summer sipper or aperitif. Each sip of this easy-drinking wine is soft and luscious on the palate, making Kim Crawford Rose the perfect complement to your favorite salads and other lighter fare. Now sold in a twin pack of 250 mL cans, each with approximately one and a half glasses of blush wine, this "perfect anytime" sipping wine has been conveniently packaged for you to enjoy wherever your social life takes you. This Kim Crawford canned rose contains grapes grown in Hawke's Bay, New Zealand, the country's oldest wine region. The diverse climate and variety of soil types in this area provide winemakers a selection of grapes that deliver the consistently flavorful wine for which Kim Crawford is known. For the best taste, refrigerate this canned wine for at least two hours before serving chilled. Make it Amazing with Kim Crawford wine. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Constellation Imports, Rutherford, CA USA

ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Zinfandel Red Wine is a slightly off-dry, medium-bodied red with a bright finish. Bursting with aromas of rich, brambly boysenberry, rhubarb pie, cloves and black pepper, this delicious red wine is perfect for many occasions. This zinfandel wine showcases a palate of lush flavors of red plum, berry and strawberry. Aging in French and American oak yields toasty vanilla notes and deep layers of complexity. This Robert Mondavi wine is crafted with fruit from California's Central Coast vineyards, where slow ripening in the cool climate by the Pacific Ocean encourages complexity and depth of flavor. Made from phenomenal grapes, Central Coast wine is ultimately of the utmost quality and is available from Robert Mondavi Private Selection at a more accessible price. Pair this red zinfandel with short ribs and burgers. Store this bottle of wine at room temperature, then refrigerate for about 30 to 60 minutes before pouring a glass. Serve cool at around 60 degrees for optimal taste. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA

ProductDescLong: The Dreaming Tree Crush Red Wine is a complex, tasty red wine blend with lots of fruit flavor. Hand-selected merlot, petite sirah, zinfandel, tannat and other grape varietals are aged for 17 months in oak barrels, producing flavors and aromas of raspberry jam, red and dark fruit, with hints of mocha and vanilla. ProductDescLong: Handcrafting wines since 1995, Toasted Head's estate vineyards in Yolo's Dunnigan Hills. A designated American Viticultural Area on the eastern side of California's appellation perched on rolling hillsides with well-drained gravelly loam soils. Named for the age-old practice of toasting barrel heads with fire, which is what helps to create the distinct toasted flavors in all our wines. DigitalCatalogProductName: Spoken Barrel Cabernet Sauvignon, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Spoken Barrel Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine is a bold and complex wine with classic flavors of blackberry and cherry. Crafted in the Columbia Valley, this Washington wine has a toasty vanilla finish.
ProductDescLong: Spoken Barrel Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine is a bold and complex red blend with flavors of blackberry and cherry. This cabernet sauvignon wine starts with lush, classic aromas of cherry, black currant, dark chocolate and roasted oak and finishes with a toasty vanilla flavor and fine, velvety tannins. Hailing from the rugged growing conditions of the Columbia Valley region, this Washington State wine contains 78% cabernet sauvignon, 13% syrah, 4% petit verdot and 5% merlot. Sourced from top vineyards, the grapes in this red wine blend are destemmed and fermented warm on the skins in stainless steel tanks to extract rich flavors, colors and tannins. Deep ruby in color, this red table wine is best stored at room temperature. Chill this bottle of wine for 30 to 60 minutes before serving cool, around 60 degrees. Spoken Barrel's high-quality wines are easy to pick out, open up and share with confidence. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Spoken Barrel, Prosser, WA USA

ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Malbec Red Wine is a malbec wine from Argentina with intense fruit flavors and hints of oak that pairs well with pasta, spicy food, barbecue or a rich beef roast.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Malbec Red Wine is a dark red wine with intense flavors of plum, blueberry, vanilla and spice, enhanced by distinctive aromas of raspberry, blackberry, and a hint of pepper. Inspired by winemaking everywhere, this malbec wine from Argentina is made with grapes from the province of Mendoza where malbec is practically the national grape. With fruit that matures slowly, developing the delicious pure fruit flavors unique to Mendoza, this Robert Mondavi Private Selection wine finishes with notes of buttered blueberry and wild berries with hints of oak. Enjoy this bottled wine with pasta, spicy food, barbecue or a rich beef roast. For best taste and quality, store this red malbec wine at room temperature and refrigerate for 30 to 60 minutes before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: The Prisoner Napa Valley Red Blend, The Prisoner Wine Company, Red Wine, 1.5 L Bottle
ProductDescShort: The Prisoner Napa Valley Red Wine Blend features bold tastes of berry and vanilla with notes of dark chocolate and roasted fig, making this red blend perfect at your next barbecue.
ProductDescLong: The Prisoner Napa Valley Red Wine Blend is ripe and luscious with a diverse combination of grapes that gives it a distinct quality and character. This red blend is inspired by the mixed blacks first made by the Italian immigrants who originally settled in Napa Valley. Crafted through the unlikely mix of zinfandel, cabernet sauvignon, petite sirah, syrah and charbono, this California red wine features enticing aromas of bing cherry, dark chocolate, clove and roasted fig. Those scents give way to persistent tastes of raspberry, boysenberry and pomegranate with a lingering vanilla flavor. Aged in a combination of French and American oak barrels, the full flavors of this Napa Valley wine make it a great match for grilled and barbecued meats, especially if you throw sweet or tomato-based sauce on top. Top off a meal with this red blend for a smooth and luscious finish that lingers on the palate. Choose The Prisoner wine to add a little edge to your glass of wine. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 The Prisoner Wine Company, St. Helena, CA USA.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Pinot Noir, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Pinot Noir Red Wine is a distinctive, fruit-forward wine that delivers intense flavors of red plum, dark cherry and vanilla with a silky texture and long finish.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Pinot Noir Red Wine is a fruit-forward red table wine that complements a variety of dishes. Each glass showcases intense flavors of red plum, dark cherry and vanilla. The silky texture of this pinot noir wine carries its pure, vibrant flavors gracefully into a long, fruit-filled finish. ProductDescLong: Inniskillin Icewine, recognized as one of the world�s great wines, is truly winter�s gift to wine lovers. Harvested at the pinnacle of Canada�s crisp winter, the grapes are naturally frozen on the vine and picked when the temperature drops to -10 degrees C. Only a few drops of luscious nectar can be squeezed from each bunch, which is then expertly guided through fermentation to achieve this rich and alluring specialty wine. This Niagara River appellation wine opens with abundant aromatics of apricot, peach and pineapple integrate well with the French oaks and flavors of mango, clove and orange peel. Pairs well with salted creme caramel or traditional creme brule, any ash aged cheeses, tarte tatin, Vidal French onion soup or caramelized onion tart. Serve chilled.

Hogue Cellars wine is made with grapes that have intense fruit flavors and high natural acidity, which is why it is one of the most recognized names in Washington wines. ProductDescShort: SIMI Sonoma County Chardonnay White Wine is a California white wine with fresh flavors and a crisp and creamy finish. This food-friendly wine pairs well with seafood, salads, grilled pork and pasta.
ProductDescLong: SIMI Sonoma County Chardonnay White Wine is a food-friendly table white wine with expressive fruit flavors and aromas. Notes of tangerine, white peach, green apple, Meyer lemon and orange blossom combine with hints of butter, cream, vanilla and flint. Aged for eight months in French and American oak barrels, this California wine combines chardonnay grapes from the most prestigious regions of Sonoma County, producing zesty, fresh flavors of tangerine, lemon curd, stone fruit, white peach and nectarine that awaken the palate with every sip. This crisp white wine has a creamy finish with hints of orange peel and vanilla, making it the perfect companion to caprese salad, smoked salmon, prawns, poached halibut with salsa verde, tortellini alla panna, grilled pork loin with stone fruit compote or asparagus with hollandaise sauce and a soft poached egg. For best taste and quality, chill this luscious SIMI chardonnay for two to two and a half hours at around 50 degrees before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 SIMI Winery, Geyserville, CA

ProductDisclaimerSparkling: SPARKLING WARNING: BE CAREFUL! Point bottle away from self and others to avoid serious eye injury.  Stopper may eject forcefully while you are removing the hood or at any time after hood removal.  Bottle contains high pressure which increases with warmth or shaking.  To open: (1) chill well, (2) do not shake, (3) point bottle away from self and others, (4) remove hood, (5) twist stopper out slowly by hand.  NEVER use a cork remover or reinsert stopper.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Prosecco DOC, Italian White Sparkling Wine, 3 pk 187 mL Bottles
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Prosecco DOC Sparkling White Wine is a creamy and crisp Italian prosecco with flavors of peach and golden apples. It is ideal on its own or paired with pizza, seafood and shellfish dishes.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Prosecco DOC Sparkling White Wine is an Italian sparkling wine meant to be sipped and enjoyed. This creamy and crisp extra dry white wine offers fruity aromas accompanied by hints of wisteria, with an intense peach and golden apple flavor. This Italian wine begins in the hilly area of Valdobbiadene, with glera grapes that undergo a traditional wine vinification. The winemakers then use selected yeasts in a natural refermentation process to create this clean and delicate Ruffino prosecco wine with refined bubbles and a pleasant finish. Enjoy this Italian prosecco as an aperitif, mix it into your favorite cocktail or pair it with margherita pizza, seafood, shellfish and white meat dishes. For the best quality and taste, drink this Ruffino wine young. Refrigerate for three to three and a half hours and serve at a temperature between 45 and 48 degrees. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA.

ProductDescShort: Hogue Cabernet Sauvignon has aromas of black currant, blueberry, lavender, black pepper, cocoa, molasses, and dried tobacco, with hints of toast. On the palate, this red wine is rich and creamy.
ProductDescLong: The majority of Washington�s wine grapes are planted east of the Cascade Range in the Columbia Valley appellation, which encompasses the Yakima Valley and Walla Walla appellations. The Columbia Valley covers 18,000 square miles and provides a huge range of geographical and climatic conditions for grape growing. Hogue Cellars wine is made with grapes that have intense fruit flavors and high natural acidity, which is why it is one of the most recognized names in Washington wines. This cabernet sauvignon offers enticing scents of black currant, blueberry, lavender, black pepper, cocoa, molasses, and dried tobacco, with touches of cream and toast. On the palate, it�s rich and creamy with flavors of blackberry, cherry, dark chocolate, maple, vanilla, and spice. Pair with pepper steak, prime rib, and dark chocolate.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Cuttings Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon, The Prisoner Wine Company, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Cuttings Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine is a delicious red blend with rich flavors of blueberry, dark cherry and cocoa that pairs well with steak and vegetables, lamb or a cheeseburger.
ProductDescLong: Cuttings Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine is a delicious red wine blend with rich flavors of blueberry, dark cherry and cocoa, enhanced by scents of fresh roasted coffee, black currant, vanilla bean, brown spice and wild berries. Inspired by the age-old method of using cuttings from idyllic sites for the propagation of new vines, this California red wine combines grapes from premier hillside vineyards in Napa Valley. The intense flavor of cabernet sauvignon joins with the structure of petite sirah and syrah, with a small amount of zinfandel that adds a nice layer of complexity and spiciness, earning this red blend the title of Best in Class at the 2018 San Francisco Chronicle Wine Competition. Aged in French oak casks for 18 months, this full-bodied cabernet sauvignon wine has a smooth finish that pairs well with steak and vegetables, lamb or a cheeseburger. For best taste and quality, store this barrel aged wine at room temperature and refrigerate for 30 minutes before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 The Prisoner Wine Company, St. Helena, CA USA

Regarded as one of the pioneers of winemaking, Drylands continues to carry on its vision. Drylands Sauvignon Blanc opens with layers of passion fruit, fruit zest, and tropical fruit on the nose with a hint of elderflower. ProductDescShort: Meiomi Pinot Noir Red Wine features grapes harvested from three of California's top winegrowing regions for a bold taste. This Meiomi wine pairs well with dark chocolate or thin crust pizza.
ProductDescLong: Meiomi Pinot Noir Red Wine brings you structure and depth seldom seen in a pinot noir wine, thanks to its unique and meticulous aging process. Aged for six months in French oak barrels, this California red wine's juicy strawberry flavor and notes of dark berries and toasted mocha add complexity and depth on the palate. With a rich garnet color and a ruby edge, this pinot noir wine permeates aromas of bright fruit jam, mocha and oak. This California wine owes much of its complexity to its varied upbringing, featuring grapes harvested from Monterey, Santa Barbara and Sonoma. The silky texture and balanced acidity of this Meiomi wine make it a perfect table top companion for dark chocolate or thin crust pizza. Meiomi Pinot Noir offers a full-bodied taste that stays with you for a lengthy finish no matter the meal. It's that unrivaled taste that earned this California red wine 92 points from The Tasting Panel. Bring out this bottle of wine at your next get-together for a lasting impression. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Meiomi Wines, Acampo, CA USA.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Auros Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Auros Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon opens with aromas of blackberry and blueberry. The palate unveils layers of black currant jam, coffee, tobacco and vanilla. This red wine has a velvety finish.
ProductDescLong: Auros is crafted with hand-selected fruit from a combination of vineyards blocks in our Napa Valley appellation. The grapes were hand-picked and hand-sorted, and then briefly cold soaked to enhance the extraction of vivid color from the cabernet fruit. The juice was kept in contact with the skins for two weeks to build rich, soft tannins in the wine. Aged in French oak barrels for 18 months, this cabernet sauvignon opens with dark fruit aromas of cassis, blackberry, and dried blueberry. The rich, full-bodied palate unveils layers of black currant jam, roasted coffee, tobacco, dried fig, and vanilla bean. Soft, supple tannins frame a plush velvety finish. Varietal: 77% cabernet sauvignon, 17% merlot, 3% petite verdot, 2% syrah, 1% cabernet franc.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Franciscan Chardonnay, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Franciscan Chardonnay has aromas of bright fruit, minerals, and honeyed pear-apple. This white wine has a bright and vibrant palate, rich flavors evoking apple galette, honey, and creamy vanilla bean.
ProductDescLong: Founded in 1973, Franciscan has a long tradition of crafting wine with a highly meticulous approach. Franciscan's home estate is located in Oakville, right in the heart of the Napa Valley (57% Monterey County, 43% Napa County) appellation. This 240-acre parcel of land features loamy, gravelly, well-draining soil which adds structure to the wines. At Franciscan Estate, the wine lots are kept separate from the vineyard until just before bottling. After picking by hand, every load of grapes is assigned its own tank. This chardonnay has aromas of bright fruit, minerals, and honeyed pear-apple. A bright and vibrant palate shows rich flavors evoking apple galette, honey, and creamy vanilla bean. Varietal: 100% chardonnay.

ProductDescShort: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Bourbon Barrel-Aged Cabernet Sauvignon red wine has aromas of vanilla and cocoa with rich flavors of blackberry, plum, and toasted marshmallow.
ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Bourbon Barrel-Aged Cabernet Sauvignon is a full bodied red wine with aromas of vanilla, oak spice, and cocoa. Ripe fruit flavors of blackberry and plum are complemented with hints of vanilla bean and toasted marshmallow. This California wine is sourced from premium California vineyards, selected for their varietal expression and style complimentary to Bourbon barrel aging. A select portion of the blend is aged in used Bourbon barrels to impart a rich, toasty finish.  This Cabernet pairs well with comfort food -- try it with a braised oxtail and mashed root vegetables.  Store at room temperature, then chill for 30 to 60 minutes before serving at around 60 degrees. Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi offers 40 years of heritage and Robert Mondavi's relentless pursuit of quality in every bottle to ensure everyone has access to better wine. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Woodbridge Winery, Acampo, CA USA

ProductDescShort: The Dreaming Tree Sonoma County Sauvignon Blanc White Wine is brimming with tropical fruit aromas and vibrant pineapple flavor. Light and refreshing, it's great with lobster salad or spicy food.
ProductDescLong: The Dreaming Tree Sonoma County Sauvignon Blanc White Wine, part of an exciting collaboration between musician Dave Matthews and winemaker Sean McKenzie, hits all the right notes. Fresh, juicy and great for sipping, this crisp white wine exudes tropical aromas of passion fruit and kiwi. The pineapple flavor and hints of zesty lime and grapefruit bring harmony to the structure of this California white wine. With grapes harvested from the notable Sonoma County winegrowing region, this sauvignon blanc wine maintains the youthful characteristics of its fruit, thanks to a quick and efficient bottling process. The lightness of this white wine makes it a perfect match for seafood dishes like lobster salad and a natural companion to spicy food. With its bright and vibrant taste, it's no wonder this California wine took home a Gold Medal from the World Value Wine Challenge in 2017. Keep the flavors of this sauvignon blanc wine singing by refrigerating it for at least two hours before serving chilled. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 The Dreaming Tree, Geyserville, CA USA.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Prosecco DOC Made With Organic Grapes, Italian White Sparkling Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Prosecco made with Organic Grapes DOC Sparkling Wine is made from grapes cultivated without chemical products or synthetic fertilizers and has hint of apple, pear, elderberry and citrus.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Prosecco made with Organic Grapes DOC Sparkling White Wine is an Italian sparkling wine meant to be savored and enjoyed. The wine is made from grapes cultivated without chemical products or synthetic fertilizers. This elegant sparkling wine is made with organic grapes and has hints of apple, pear, elderberry and citrus. The bouquet is fragrant and bursting with fruit notes along with delicate bubbles on the palate. This Italian wine begins in the hilly area of Valdobbiadene, with glera grapes that undergo a traditional wine vinification. The winemakers then use selected yeasts in a natural refermentation process to create this clean and delicate Ruffino prosecco wine with refined bubbles and a pleasant finish. Enjoy this Italian prosecco as an aperitif and it is quite versatile with appetizers. For the best quality and taste, drink this Ruffino wine cold. Refrigerate for three to three and a half hours and serve at a temperature between 45 and 48 degrees. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA.

Wild Horse Pinot Gris is a delightfully rich, complex wine with aromas of lychee, stone fruit, passion fruit, and tropical fruits with a touch of slate and minerality. DigitalCatalogProductName: Ravenswood Pickberry Vineyard Meritage, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescLong: Ravenswood wines capture the spirit of California�s Sonoma Valley appellation best growing regions and the popular Vintners Blend bottlings sourced from vineyards throughout California. Ravenswood strives to put what is picked from the fields right into the bottle. From Dry Creek, north of Healdsburg to the edge of the bay of the Carneros Valley, founder Joel Peterson has forged strong bonds with a cadre of grape growers who share Ravenswood's commitment and stubborn independence. Aged 19 months in French oak barrels, this meritage from the Pickberry Vineyard displays aromas of cherry, plum, currant, cigar box, and leather. It is a wonderfully balanced wine with a lingering finish. Varietal: 39.4% cabernet sauvignon, 33.9% merlot, 14.6% malbec, 12.1% petit verdot.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Maestro, Red Wine, 1.5 L Bottle
ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Maestro Red Wine is a vintage-driven red blend that displays vibrant flavor and plush tannins, making it ideal for pairing with beef, pork, lamb or pasta dishes.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Maestro Red Wine is a true vintage-driven red blend created to honor Robert Mondavi. A crescendo of dark, juicy plum and cassis fruit, violet, cinnamon and unsweetened cocoa linger on the palate, while each sumptuous sip boasts vibrant flavor and plush tannins with a lingering finish. Created based on what the vintage provides, this red wine blend of cabernet sauvignon, cabernet franc, merlot and petit verdot is sourced from two prized sub-regions of Napa Valley: Oakville and Stags Leap. This Napa Valley wine undergoes a total of 24 days of wine to skin contact, maximizing the extraction of varietal character while keeping the tannins fleshy and supple. Malolactic fermentation in French oak barrels assures seamless integration of fruit and oak. Pair a glass of this dark red wine with pork, beef, steak, pasta or lamb dishes. For optimal taste, store at room temperature, then refrigerate this bottle of wine for about 30 to 60 minutes before pouring. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Robert Mondavi Winery, Oakville, CA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Estancia Reserve Meritage, Red Wine, 375 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Estancia Meritage showcases the finest red blend from our Paso Robles vineyards. Our label assures that this red wine is a blend of at least two of the five red Bordeaux varieties.
ProductDescLong: Estancia's vineyard lies in the Thermal Rainbow of Monterey County appellation, which features midday heat tempered by morning and late-afternoon fog-perfect for developing the intense fruit character. Pinnacles Vineyard was one of the first vineyards in California to be planted with a permanent irrigation system. This meritage red wine displays a rich, exquisite mouthfeel, velvety tannins, and ripe fruit balanced with notes of chocolate and French vanilla. Pairs well with steak, poultry, cauliflower, fruit and seafood. Varietal: 55% cabernet sauvignon, 22% merlot, 18% petit verdot, 5% malbec.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Mark West Carneros Sonoma Pinot Noir, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Mark West Carneros Sonoma Pinot Noir is dark ruby-red with red cherry and cranberry aromas and rhubarb, nutmeg, and toasty caramel flavors. This red wine pairs with beef, pork chops, and grilled fish.
ProductDescLong: Mark West Wines accepts nothing less than the best, which is why the fruit for the wines is sourced from the finest vineyards throughout California. To make the best pinot noir, vintners first gently de-stem and crush the grapes when they come into the winery. Daily punch-downs and pump-overs extract flavor and color. This wine is a dark ruby-red masterpiece with red cherry and cranberry aromas and raspberry, rhubarb, nutmeg, and toasty caramel flavors. Pair perfectly with beef stroganoff, roasted pork chops, and grilled fish with a light cream sauce. At Mark West, there's nothing more important than sharing a passion for pinot with others.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Rose, Blush Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Rose Wine combines delicate floral aromas with crisp, refreshing flavors of strawberry and watermelon. This blush wine pairs well with light salads, pasta or seafood.
ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Rose Wine blends premium grapes primarily from the syrah and tempranillo varieties to highlight refreshing flavors of strawberry, floral, watermelon and grapefruit. Grapes sourced from California's Lodi region give this light wine intense fruity aromas and please the palate with a crisp finish and fresh acidity. This rose wine's lively bouquet makes it the perfect addition to a cheese and wine party. Enjoy a glass on its own before dinner or pair with a light salad, goat cheese or even seafood pasta.  Chill this blush wine in the refrigerator for at least two hours before serving cold at around 50 degrees. Crafted for over 30 years and perfect for every day, choose Woodbridge wine for a taste that's vibrant yet delicate. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Woodbridge Winery, Acampo, CA USA.

ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Winery Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine is defined by intense, complex flavors and balanced acidity, making it the perfect complement to almost any pork, beef, lamb or pasta dish.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Winery Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine is defined by intensity, muscle and concentration. Flavors of fresh blackberry, wild berry compote, cassis and dark cocoa powder dance on the tongue, while notes of forest floor, allspice and sweet vanilla provide complexity. This Napa Valley red wine blend contains cabernet sauvignon, cabernet franc and petite verdot grapes, all hand-harvested from Kalon Vineyard in west Oakville. This cabernet sauvignon wine undergoes 34 days of wine to skin contact, maximizing the extraction of varietal character and complexity while keeping the tannins round and supple and the acidity balanced. Malolactic fermentation in French oak barrels assures a delicious red wine with seamless integration of fruit and oak. Pair a glass of this Napa Valley cabernet sauvignon with your favorite pork, beef, steak, lamb or pasta dishes. Store this bottle of wine at room temperature, then refrigerate for about 30 to 60 minutes before serving cool. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA

ProductDescShort: Kim Crawford Sauvignon Blanc White Wine features the refreshing flavors of passion fruit, melon, and grapefruit, making this Marlborough region white wine a brilliant complement to seafood or salad.
ProductDescLong: Kim Crawford Sauvignon Blanc White Wine is fresh and juicy with ripe, tropical flavors of passion fruit, melon, and stone fruit. Each sip of wine reveals classic Marlborough sauvignon blanc aromas of lifted citrus, tropical fruit, and crushed herbs, along with vibrant acidity and plenty of weight and length on the palate. This New Zealand sauvignon blanc is made with grapes specially selected from vineyards in Marlborough's Wairau Valley and the neighboring Awatere Valley. The climate and fast-draining soil in this region offer winemakers a selection of grapes that deliver the consistently flavorful wine for which Kim Crawford is known. Pair this Kim Crawford white wine with fresh oysters, asparagus, lobster, or a light salad. For optimal taste, refrigerate this sauvignon blanc wine for at least two hours then serve chilled. Make it Amazing with Kim Crawford wine. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Constellation Imports, Rutherford, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Chardonnay, White Wine, 500 mL Go Pack
ProductDescShort: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Chardonnay White Wine offers a vibrant and medium body that pairs easily with appetizers and entrees. Tropical fruit aromas mix with spice, leading to a toasty finish.
ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Chardonnay White Wine displays aromas of rich tropical fruit combined with a hint of cinnamon and maple. A medium body with vibrant acidity showcases characteristic flavors of ripe pear and green apple, leading to a toasty finish with vanilla oak notes. Sip this chardonnay wine on its own or pair it with delightful appetizers and hearty dishes like lemon pepper chicken. Grapes in this California wine are sourced from the Lodi region. By using state-of-the-art winemaking technology, employing unique growing techniques and cultivating relationships with the local growers, Woodbridge is able to produce high quality grapes for an excellent wine. Chill this chardonnay wine in the refrigerator for 2 to 2 and a half hours before serving at around 50 degrees. Crafted for over 30 years and perfect for every day, Woodbridge offers approachable white wines that you don't have to overthink. DigitalCatalogProductName: Saldo Zinfandel, The Prisoner Wine Company, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: The Prisoner Wine Company Saldo Zinfandel has aromas of black licorice, pepper and cherry. The palate is smooth with a hint of chocolate. This red wine is voluptuous with soft, velvety tannins.
ProductDescLong: The Prisoner Wine Company takes an unconventional approach to winemaking by working with impassioned growers to source varietals from vineyards and appellations across California. Alongside a family of growers, The Prisoner winemaking team pushes boundaries as they craft a selection of unexpected, yet artful wines. We created Saldo to feature this outstanding fruit from Dry Creek, Lodi, and Amador, where zinfandel has thrived for decades. Dark ruby color with bold aromas of black licorice, black pepper, cherry, and baking spice. The entry is rich, full, and scintillating. The palate is mouthwatering and smooth with a hint of chocolate. The finish is voluptuous with soft, velvety tannins. Varietal: 85% zinfandel, 15% blend of petite sirah and syrah.

ProductDescShort: Clos du Bois Cabernet Sauvignon has aromas of black currant, blackberry, and oak barrel spice. It is a full-bodied red wine with a smooth texture that leads to a complex and slightly dry finish.
ProductDescLong: Clos du Bois Winery farms almost 800 acres in the vibrantly diverse wine regions of Sonoma County and Coastal California. Working with a family of trusted growers from some of the best vineyards, each vintage is crafted to achieve balance, intensity, and true varietal character. This Clos du Bois Cabernet Sauvignon is full-bodied and velvety on the palate. The wine is deep purple in color with a ruby red hue; it displays aromas of ripe blackberry with hints of milk chocolate and oak barrel spice. This lush Cabernet Sauvignon red wine pairs well with grilled meats and veggies.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Modus Toscana IGT, Italian Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Modus Toscana Red Wine is full-bodied with a modern style and rich with silky tannins, making it the perfect addition to an elegant wine and cheese party.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Modus Toscana Red Wine weaves together vibrant fresh fruit flavors from sangiovese, cabernet sauvignon and merlot red grapes with finesse, each adding their own distinctive characteristics. Sangiovese lends texture, merlot works in smoothness and cabernet gives structure. This red wine blend is intriguing on the nose with initial aromas of mature red and black fruits, such as cherries, plums, and small black berries. These intense aromas are complemented by hints of spices, sweet tobacco and refined balsamic notes. Full-bodied with a modern style, this red wine blend is rich with silky tannins and a long finish of vanilla and red berry. Containing the best grapes from the Poggio Casciano estate, this Italian wine reveals itself without coaxing or manipulation. Pair a glass with duck and pancetta, beef-stuffed manicotti and aged cheeses. Store this bottle of wine at room temperature, but refrigerate for about 30 to 60 minutes before pouring a glass. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA

ProductDescShort: Rex Goliath Pinot Noir has true varietal flavors, an easy drinking fruit-forward profile. A fine balance between soft, subtle, complex and bold. This red wine can be paired with a variety of foods.
ProductDescLong: At the turn of the 20th century, Rex Goliath, the �World�s Largest Rooster�, was the treasured attraction of a Texas circus. We honor Rex with our premium varietal wines. Mark Ferguson joined the team as a winemaker in 2011 and has added his expertise to every bottle ever since. He brings enthusiasm and comprehensive experience and works to continue the legacy of bold flavors and big personality for which the wines have become known. Rex Goliath wines have won more than 65 gold medals in the major wine competitions. With true varietal flavors and an easy drinking, fruit-forward profile, this pinot noir reaches a fine balance between soft and subtle, complex and bold. It is the perfect wine for everyday drinking, and can be paired with a wide variety of foods.

ProductDescShort: Hogue Genesis Cabernet Sauvignon opens with blueberry, cherry, strawberry, molasses, dried tobacco leaf, toast, and cream. The palate of this red wine is rich and creamy along with spice flavors.
ProductDescLong: The majority of  Washington�s wine grapes are planted east of the Cascade Range in the Columbia Valley appellation, which encompasses the Yakima Valley and Walla Walla appellations. The Columbia Valley covers 18,000 square miles and provides a huge range of geographical and climatic conditions for grape growing.  Hogue Cellars wine is made with grapes that have intense fruit flavors and high natural acidity, which is why it is one of the most recognized names in Washington wines. The Genesis Cabernet Sauvignon's grapes were picked at mid-day and during the late afternoon to encourage fermentation. This cabernet opens with blueberry, cherry, strawberry, molasses, dried tobacco leaf, toast, and cream. The palate is rich and creamy with blackberry, vanilla, maple, cocoa, and spice flavors. Pair with braised short ribs, roast pork, or grilled salmon.

ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Merlot Red Wine has intense, ripe flavors and bright acidity, making it a great addition to a wine and cheese pairing or a dinner party.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Merlot Red Wine has intense, ripe flavors and bright acidity that pairs well with a variety of dishes. Distinctive aromas of ripe red cherry, Asian plum and cranberry, along with hints of black olive, tea leaf, baking spice and sweet oak, make this red merlot a unique dark red wine. Mocha, brown sugar and sweet oak round out the nose, while the palate brims with dark ripe cherry, Marion berry and plum flavors. Oak aging lends sweet toast and brown sugar notes to the lingering finish. This Robert Mondavi red wine is crafted with fruit from California's Central Coast vineyards, where slow ripening in the cool climate by the Pacific Ocean encourages complexity and depth of flavor. Made with phenomenal grapes, Central Coast wine is of the utmost quality and is offered by Robert Mondavi Private Selection at a more accessible price. Pair this merlot wine with rotisserie chicken, meat ravioli, wild salmon and herbed cheese. Serve cool at around 60 degrees for optimal taste. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA

DigitalCatalogProductName: Mount Veeder Cabernet Franc, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Mount Veeder Cabernet Franc has a smooth entry of mixed berries and cherry cordial leading to a good depth of flavor. This red wine has aromas of luscious blackberry, bay, anise and cocoa.
ProductDescLong: Mount Veeder Winery was the first vineyard in the Napa Valley appellation to have all five of the grape varieties used in a classic Bordeaux blend. Mount Veeder Winery feels that blending is the key to crafting the most complete, balanced wine. Artisanal winemaking skills, beginning with gentle handling in the vineyard and finishing with extended barrel aging in the cellar, ensure the wines are enjoyable upon release, yet capable of graceful aging. Smooth entry of mixed berries and cherry cordial lead to black pepper and savory notes with good depth of flavor. Abundant with pepper and tobacco notes on the long finish. Aromas of luscious dark cherry, blackberry, bay, anise and cocoa are rich and inviting on the nose. Varietal: 76% cabernet franc, 24% cabernet sauvignon.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Mark West Willamette Valley Pinot Noir, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Mark West Pinot Noir is earthy red in color, with cranberry, cherry, and red apple aromas. A touch of vanilla, baking spice, coffee, and moist, earthy soil lead to a clean, dry finish.
ProductDescLong: Mark West Wines accepts nothing less than the best, which is why the fruit for the wines is sourced from the finest vineyards throughout California. To make the best pinot noir, vintners first gently de-stem and crush the grapes when they come into the winery. Daily punch-downs and pump-overs extract flavor and color. This pinot noir is earthy red in color, with cranberry, cherry, and red apple aromas. A touch of vanilla, baking spice, coffee, and moist, earthy soil lead to a clean, dry finish.  Pair perfectly with meats...many different meats. And cheese...firm cheese like Asiago, dry jack, or manchego. At Mark West, there's nothing more important than sharing a passion for pinot with others.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Chianti DOCG, Italian Red Wine, 375 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Chianti DOCG Red Wine is an Italian wine that balances freshness with a soft and lingering finish. With fruity and floral aromatics, it pairs well with Italian dishes or a classic hamburger.
ProductDescLong: Chianti DOCG Red Wine combines sangiovese grapes with merlot and cabernet sauvignon to create this top quality red wine blend. This Ruffino wine features deep, fruity plum and intense cherry flavors, accompanied by hints of spice, hazelnut, and delicate violet aromas. Harvested from the well-known winegrowing areas of the Chianti region, this red blend goes through alcoholic fermentation aided by racking and punch-downs in stainless steel and concrete vats for two weeks, followed by four months of aging. This results in a fresh and balanced medium-bodied fruity wine that is easy to enjoy and lingers on the palate. Easy to sip and approachable, this chianti wine pairs well with Italian dishes such as ravioli, margherita pizza, and beef carpaccio, or international favorites such as a classic hamburger. As its first wine ever produced, this chianti red wine occupies a special place in the heart and history of Ruffino, serving as a benchmark for quality and consistency for many wine lovers worldwide. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA

ProductDescLong: Richards Wild Irish Rose is a strong but sweet wine that consistently delivers great taste. One of the first branded wines in America, Wild Irish Rose has been delivering quality, full-flavored, and fruity fortified wines for more than 50 years. The lambrusco and vinifera juices are cool fermented in stainless steel. The wine is then blended, sweetened, and fortified with citrus brandy. Wild Irish Rose 17% Red Wine is 100% pure grape wine. A proprietary blend of native New York grape juice and white grape juice is used. Special care is taken to preserve the delicate, concord grape taste profile and color. Balance: medium body and medium sweet. Fruit: concord grape character.

ProductDescLong: As the central valley heats up, cool maritime breezes are drawn across Woodbridge's Lodi region winery creating a Mediterranean-like climate of warm days and cool nights ideal for growing premium grapes. By using modern technology for winemaking, employing unique growing techniques, and cultivating relationships with the local growers, Woodbridge is able to help ensure high quality grapes that would produce excellent wines. With aromas of nectarine and fresh peach, this crisp and refreshing Pinot Grigio is a food-friendly wine and a delightful addition to any warm and sunny afternoon and pairs well with seafood and other light dishes. Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Pinot Grigio is a well-rounded white wine with a refreshing peach-citrus finish that pairs nicely with oysters, roast chicken or Brie. Serve slightly chilled. ProductDescShort: Ruffino Prosecco DOC Sparkling White Wine is a creamy and crisp Italian prosecco with flavors of peach and golden apples. It is ideal on its own or paired with pizza, seafood and shellfish dishes.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Prosecco DOC Sparkling White Wine is an Italian sparkling wine meant to be sipped and enjoyed. This creamy and crisp extra dry white wine offers fruity aromas accompanied by hints of wisteria, with an intense peach and golden apple flavor. This Italian wine begins in the hilly area of Valdobbiadene, with glera grapes that undergo a traditional wine vinification. The winemakers then use selected yeasts in a natural refermentation process to create this clean and delicate Ruffino prosecco wine with refined bubbles and a pleasant finish. Enjoy this Italian prosecco as an aperitif, mix it into your favorite cocktail or pair it with margherita pizza, seafood, shellfish and white meat dishes. For the best quality and taste, drink this Ruffino wine young. Refrigerate for three to three and a half hours and serve at a temperature between 45 and 48 degrees. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA.

This red blend opens with aromas of currant, blackberry and toasty oak that lead into dark berry, caramel and brown sugar flavors. With spicy sensations and hints of leather and nutmeg, this Italian wine blends sangiovese, merlot and cabernet sauvignon grapes from the Lodola Nuova Estate in the Montepulciano area. Aged for 18 months in oak barrels after malolactic fermentation and a brief rest in stainless-steel vats, this varietal blend results in a top-quality Italian red wine that exemplifies Ruffino's unique and artisanal approach to winemaking. Each sip features a fruity core highlighted by a well-balanced structure, velvety tannins, and a smooth and lingering finish. ProductDescShort: Hogue Cabernet Sauvignon offers up a bouquet of black cherry, spicy oak, and tobacco, with sassafras and cassis notes. Pair this red wine with pork roast or barbecued baby back ribs.
ProductDescLong: The majority of Washington�s wine grapes are planted east of the Cascade Range in the Columbia Valley appellation, which encompasses the Yakima Valley and Walla Walla appellations. The Columbia Valley covers 18,000 square miles and provides a huge range of geographical and climatic conditions for grape growing. DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Chianti DOCG, Italian Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Chianti DOCG Red Wine is an Italian wine that balances freshness with a soft and lingering finish. With fruity and floral aromatics, it pairs well with Italian dishes or a classic hamburger.
ProductDescLong: Chianti DOCG Red Wine combines sangiovese grapes with merlot and cabernet sauvignon to create this top quality red wine blend. This Ruffino wine features deep, fruity plum and intense cherry flavors, accompanied by hints of spice, hazelnut, and delicate violet aromas. Harvested from the well-known winegrowing areas of the Chianti region, this red blend goes through alcoholic fermentation aided by racking and punch-downs in stainless steel and concrete vats for two weeks, followed by four months of aging. This results in a fresh and balanced medium-bodied fruity wine that is easy to enjoy and lingers on the palate. Easy to sip and approachable, this chianti wine pairs well with Italian dishes such as ravioli, margherita pizza, and beef carpaccio, or international favorites such as a classic hamburger. As its first wine ever produced, this chianti red wine occupies a special place in the heart and history of Ruffino, serving as a benchmark for quality and consistency for many wine lovers worldwide. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA

This dark red wine garners its unique taste thanks to varietals found all across California's prime winegrowing regions. Bring this red blend along on your next picnic and enjoy it on its own, or stack this rich, bold taste up against lamb or poultry. The bourbon barrel aging gives this wine soft tannins that deliver a full-bodied and lingering finish in each sip. For a devilishly good taste, keep this red wine blend stored at room temperature, and chill it before serving. Born from mischief, Cooper and Thief Wine celebrates doing things differently. DigitalCatalogProductName: The Prisoner Napa Valley Red Blend, The Prisoner Wine Company, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: The Prisoner Napa Valley Red Wine Blend features bold tastes of berry and vanilla with notes of dark chocolate and roasted fig, making this red blend perfect at your next barbecue.
ProductDescLong: The Prisoner Napa Valley Red Wine Blend is ripe and luscious with a diverse combination of grapes that gives it a distinct quality and character. This red blend is inspired by the mixed blacks first made by the Italian immigrants who originally settled in Napa Valley. Crafted through the unlikely mix of zinfandel, cabernet sauvignon, petite sirah, syrah and charbono, this California red wine features enticing aromas of bing cherry, dark chocolate, clove and roasted fig. Those scents give way to persistent tastes of raspberry, boysenberry and pomegranate with a lingering vanilla flavor. Aged in a combination of French and American oak barrels, the full flavors of this Napa Valley wine make it a great match for grilled and barbecued meats, especially if you throw sweet or tomato-based sauce on top. Top off a meal with this red blend for a smooth and luscious finish that lingers on the palate. Choose The Prisoner wine to add a little edge to your glass of wine. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 The Prisoner Wine Company, St. Helena, CA USA.

ProductDescShort: Ruffino Greppone Mazzi Brunello Di Montalcino Red Wine is rich and intensely flavored with a vibrant texture and abundant fruit note that pairs perfectly with rich dishes like rack of lamb.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Greppone Mazzi Brunello Di Montalcino Red Wine is lush and full-bodied, and ages well with its fine tannins, vibrant texture and abundant fruit note. Composed of sangiovese grosso red grapes, known to locals as brunello, this Italian red wine offers intense aromas of ripe plums, cassis, and maraschino cherry with notes of incense and spicy black pepper. Ruffino Brunello wine is very well-balanced with red fruit, chocolate, and tobacco culminating in a long finish. Each bottle of wine is crafted from the finest hand-picked grapes from the Greppone Mazzi Estate vineyards in Montalcino. After malolactic fermentation adds velvety texture, this Italian wine undergoes extensive aging in large oak casks, stainless steel tanks and bottles. Pair a glass of this fine wine with rack of lamb, seared duck breast or grilled portobello mushrooms. Keep this red wine at room temperature then refrigerate at least 30 minutes before serving cool for optimal taste. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA

ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Pinot Grigio White Wine showcases fresh, fruity flavors of melon and citrus framed by a crisp acidity that pairs perfectly with seafood pasta and fish tacos.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Pinot Grigio White Wine showcases fresh, fruity flavors of melon and citrus framed by a crisp acidity. Honeydew, ripe melon and flinty mineral notes dominate the nose. This Robert Mondavi wine is crafted with fruit from California's Central Coast vineyards, where slow ripening in the cool climate by the Pacific Ocean produces grapes that exude a fresh fruit flavor and bright acidity. The phenomenal grapes ultimately create Central Coast wine of the utmost quality, offered by Robert Mondavi Private Selection at an accessible price. In order to ensure purity of fruit expression, the grapes for this table white wine are gently pressed as whole clusters before undergoing cold fermentation. Serve this medium-bodied California white wine with fish tacos, Chinese chicken salad or seafood pasta. Refrigerate this bottle of wine for 2 to 2 and a half hours, and serve chilled at about 50 degrees for optimal taste. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA

The grapes sourced for this Ruffino wine come from the well-known DOCG winegrowing regions of Orvieto Classico. Sip a glass of this richly textured riesling wine on its own on a warm afternoon or serve with lightly sauteed chicken, seared scallops, or a crisp apple tart. By cultivating relationships with the local growers, Woodbridge is able to produce high quality grapes for a bottle of wine that is approachable and perfectly balanced. Chill this delicate white wine for at least two hours before serving for the best taste. Crafted for over 30 years and perfect for every day, Woodbridge offers easy-drinking white wines that you don't have to overthink. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Woodbridge Winery, Acampo, CA.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Bourbon Barrel Aged Chardonnay, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Bourbon Barrel Aged Chardonnay White Wine is the first chardonnay wine aged in bourbon barrels. It pairs well with halibut, shrimp scampi or bacon wrapped dates.
ProductDescLong: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Bourbon Barrel Aged Chardonnay White Wine is the world's first and only chardonnay wine aged in bourbon barrels. With intense aromas of ripe pineapple and toasted coconut framed by hints of toasted marshmallow and vanilla bean custard, this aged wine offers rich, creamy flavors of grilled pineapple, juicy peach, lemon custard, graham cracker, toffee and vanilla bean. Crafted from coastal fruit in Monterrey County, this California chardonnay wine is aged for at least two months in new bourbon barrels that give it its rich and toasty flavor. It's also aged in used bourbon barrels from a Kentucky distillery, which add notes of vanilla and baking spices, reflecting the expressive character of this original approach to barrel aging. Balanced by bright acidity and a lingering finish, enjoy this decadent Robert Mondavi wine with grilled halibut, shrimp scampi or bacon wrapped dates. For best taste, refrigerate this white wine for at least two hours before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Robert Mondavi, Acampo, CA USA

Pinnacles Vineyard was one of the first vineyards in California to be planted with a permanent irrigation system. DigitalCatalogProductName: Franciscan Halo Napa Valley Magnificat Meritage, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Franciscan Napa Valley Magnificat red wine opens with a beautiful nose of cherry, notes of vanilla, and sandalwood. The smooth finish lingers with notes of toasty oak, and chocolate to the finish.
ProductDescLong: Founded in 1973, Franciscan has a long tradition of crafting wine with a highly meticulous approach. Franciscan's home estate is located in Oakville, right in the heart of the Napa Valley appellation. This 240-acre parcel of land features loamy, gravelly, well-draining soil which adds structure to the wines. At Franciscan Estate, the wine lots are kept separate from the vineyard until just before bottling. After picking by hand, every load of grapes is assigned its own tank. Franciscan Napa Valley Magnificat red wine opens with a beautiful nose of ripe, perfumed cherry, with notes of vanilla, dark berry, sandalwood and creme brulee. The smooth finish lingers with notes of ripe cherry, toasty oak, and bittersweet chocolate to the finish. Varietal: 70% cabernet sauvignon, 22% merlot, 4% petit verdot, 4% malbec.

ProductDescShort: Inniskillin Niagara Icewine Riesling opens with aromas of orange, spice and lime. Flavors of peach and apricot balanced by a crisp acidity. This white wine pairs well with scallops or baked apples.
ProductDescLong: Inniskillin Icewine, recognized as one of the world�s great wines, is truly winter�s gift to wine lovers. Harvested at the pinnacle of Canada�s crisp winter, the grapes are naturally frozen on the vine and picked when the temperature drops to -10 degrees C. Only a few drops of luscious nectar can be squeezed from each bunch, which is then expertly guided through fermentation to achieve this rich and alluring specialty wine. This Niagara River appellation wine opens with aromatics of fresh orange, spice, lemon and lime. On the palate this rich and elegant wine shows great texture with concentrated flavors of peach, apricot along with a hint of clove, balanced by a crisp and lively acidity. Pairs well with brie with lavender honey, firm aged cheddar, seared scallops or classic baked apples. Serve chilled.

ProductDescLong: Founded in 1973, Franciscan has a long tradition of crafting wine with a highly meticulous approach. Franciscan's home estate is located in Oakville, right in the heart of the Napa Valley appellation. This 240-acre parcel of land features loamy, gravelly, well-draining soil which adds structure to the wines. Magnificat spent 20 months in oak, which led the aromas to trigger a mountain forest: sage, jasmine, truffle and cherry wood. Flavors of juicy dark fruit, rich toffee notes and dark-roasted coffee fill the palate. Varietal: 75% cabernet sauvignon, 17% merlot, 5% malbec, 2% petit verdot and 1% cab franc.

DigitalCatalogProductName: 240 Days Riesling, White Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: 240 Days Riesling shows expressive aromas of lime zest and white peach. This white wine has an off-dry palate, crisp with zesty acidity and a long finish.
ProductDescLong: 240 Days represents the epitome of winemaker precision amid regional complexity, highlighting some of the best-quality wines the Finger Lakes have to offer. The grapes were whole-cluster pressed immediately after harvest to preserve their fresh, aromatic flavors. The juice was settled and racked into both temperature-controlled stainless steel and 6-year old, neutral French oak barrels. The two wines were blended to create this riesling. A stunning example of the Finger Lakes appellation signature varietal. This white wine shows expressive aromas of lime zest and white peach. The off-dry palate is crisp with zesty acidity and a long finish. Varietal: 100% riesling.

ProductDescShort: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Red Blend Red Wine combines the best attributes of petite sirah, zinfandel, and syrah. This wine displays flavors of berries and spice to pair well with hearty dishes.
ProductDescLong: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Red Blend Red Wine brings you a deliciously rich, full-bodied blend of warm, toasty aromas and flavors, including jammy blackberry, vanilla, and baking spices. This California wine combines some of the best attributes of three different grape varieties that notably highlight blackberry and vanilla flavor. Syrah, zinfandel and petite sirah grapes are sourced from California's famous Lodi region and then combined with a touch of other complementary reds for a full and rich California red wine blend that gives way to a lingering finish. Store this red wine blend at room temperature, but chill in the refrigerator for 30 to 60 minutes before serving cool at around 60 degrees. Crafted for over 40 years and perfect for every day. DigitalCatalogProductName: Franciscan Cabernet Sauvignon, Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Franciscan Cabernet Sauvignon has aromas of lush berry fruit, hazelnut, and vanilla. This red wine has notes of fruit, vanilla, clove, and tobacco, leading to a seamless, soft, and gentle finish.
ProductDescLong: Founded in 1973, Franciscan has a long tradition of crafting wine with a highly meticulous approach. Franciscan's home estate is located in Oakville, right in the heart of the Napa Valley appellation. This 240-acre parcel of land features loamy, gravelly, well-draining soil which adds structure to the wines. At Franciscan Estate, the wine lots are kept separate from the vineyard until just before bottling. After picking by hand, every load of grapes is assigned its own tank. This cabernet sauvignon has aromas of lush berry fruit, hazelnut, and vanilla. This wine has notes of fruit, vanilla, clove, and tobacco, leading to a seamless, soft, and gentle finish. Varietal: 87% cabernet sauvignon, 9% merlot, 2% malbac, 2% petit verdot.

ProductDescShort: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Cabernet Sauvignon has aromas of cherries, berries, cedar, brown sugar and toast. This medium-bodied red wine has a toasty caramel finish.
ProductDescLong: As the central valley heats up, cool maritime breezes are drawn across Woodbridge's Lodi region winery creating a Mediterranean-like climate of warm days and cool nights ideal for growing premium grapes. By using modern technology for winemaking, employing unique growing techniques, and cultivating relationships with the local growers, Woodbridge is able to help ensure high quality grapes that would produce excellent wines. Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi Cabernet Sauvignon opens with aromas of cherries, berries, cedar, brown sugar, and toast. Flavors of berries, toasted marshmallow, chocolate, and graham cracker follow with a toasty caramel finish. This medium-bodied red wine pairs deliciously with grilled meats and tomato-based pasta dishes. Wines for everyday enjoyment, since 1979

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Orvieto Classico DOC, Italian White Wine, 1.5 L Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Orvieto Classico White Wine has a smooth, refreshing flavor and a unique mineral character that makes a delicious aperitif and pairs beautifully with crostini, vegetables and grilled fish.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Orvieto Classico White Wine has a fruity and floral bouquet reminiscent of green apples and meadow flowers. This Italian wine's smooth, refreshing flavors balance beautifully with its structure and acidity. Orvieto Classico offers a unique mineral character that comes from the chalky limestone soil called tufa. The finish of this white wine is long and fragrant, with hints of almond. The grapes sourced for this Ruffino wine come from the well-known DOCG winegrowing regions of Orvieto Classico. Ruffino's traditional winemaking process, combined with a brief aging in stainless steel vats, delivers an Italian wine that reveals itself without coaxing or manipulation. Enjoy this refreshing white wine as an aperitif, or pair a glass with crostini, grilled vegetables, soup or grilled fish. This 1.5 liter bottle of wine holds an ideal amount for large gatherings. Refrigerate this bottle of wine for at least two hours, and serve chilled for optimal taste. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA

ProductDescShort: Ruffino Prosecco DOC Sparkling White Wine is a creamy and crisp Italian prosecco with flavors of peach and golden apples. It is ideal on its own or paired with pizza, seafood and shellfish dishes.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Prosecco DOC Sparkling White Wine is an Italian sparkling wine meant to be sipped and enjoyed. This creamy and crisp extra dry white wine offers fruity aromas accompanied by hints of wisteria, with an intense peach and golden apple flavor. This Italian wine begins in the hilly area of Valdobbiadene, with glera grapes that undergo a traditional wine vinification. The winemakers then use selected yeasts in a natural refermentation process to create this clean and delicate Ruffino prosecco wine with refined bubbles and a pleasant finish. Enjoy this Italian prosecco as an aperitif, mix it into your favorite cocktail or pair it with margherita pizza, seafood, shellfish and white meat dishes. For the best quality and taste, drink this Ruffino wine young. Refrigerate for three to three and a half hours and serve at a temperature between 45 and 48 degrees. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA.

ProductDescLong: Ravenswood wines capture the spirit of California�s Sonoma Valley appellation best growing regions and the popular Vintners Blend bottlings sourced from vineyards throughout California. From Dry Creek, north of Healdsburg to the edge of the bay of the Carneros Valley, founder Joel Peterson has forged strong bonds with a cadre of grape growers who share Ravenswood's commitment and stubborn independence. Aged 19 months in French oak barrels, this zinfandel is refined and reserved yet assertive. It displays aromas of red fruit, dried flowers, anise, and bramble spice. ProductDescShort: Franciscan Sauvignon Blanc features bold and bright aromas, with notes of grapefruit and guava. This white wine taste of lime and pear with subtle minerality, giving way to a clean finish.
ProductDescLong: Founded in 1973, Franciscan has a long tradition of crafting wine with a highly meticulous approach. Franciscan's home estate is located in Oakville, right in the heart of the Napa Valley (57% Monterey County, 43% Napa County) appellation. This 240-acre parcel of land features loamy, gravelly, well-draining soil which adds structure to the wines. At Franciscan Estate, the wine lots are kept separate from the vineyard until just before bottling. After picking by hand, every load of grapes is assigned its own tank. This sauvignon blanc features bold and bright aromas, with notes of grapefruit, lime zest, and guava. It tastes of bright acidity with flavors of lime and pear with subtle minerality, and a round palate of lychee gives way to a clean finish. Varietal: 89% sauvignon blanc, 9% malvasia bianca, 1% chardonnay, 1% semillon.

DigitalCatalogProductName: Ruffino Riserva Ducale Oro Gran Selezione Chianti Classico DOCG, Italian Red Wine, 750 mL Bottle
ProductDescShort: Ruffino Riserva Ducale Oro Gran Selezione Chianti Classico DOCG Red Wine is an elegant and well-structured fruity wine with spicy notes. It pairs well with traditional Italian and American dishes.
ProductDescLong: Ruffino Riserva Ducale Oro Gran Selezione Chianti Classico DOCG Red Wine is an elegant and well-structured red wine blend that expresses a distinctive Tuscan bouquet of violet, cherry and plum, with scents of chocolate and spice. Made with meticulously hand-harvested chianti, merlot and colorino grapes from Ruffino's acclaimed Gretole and Santedame estates in the Castellina sub-region of Chianti Classico, this Italian red wine offers powerfully fruity flavors with intriguing notes of cinnamon and clove. This red blend ages in oak, stainless steel and concrete vats for 36 months, followed by additional months in the bottle before release, resulting in a full-bodied chianti wine with elegant tannins, good acidity and a lasting finish with hints of chocolate and coffee. Enjoy this fine wine with traditional Italian dishes such as pasta with bolognese sauce, wild boar ragu or eggplant parmesan. It also pairs well with classic American dishes such as grilled rib eye and roasted vegetables. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Ruffino Import Company, Rutherford, CA USA

This lightly sweet white wine is crafted in the Lodi region, which is ideal for growing premium grapes thanks to its Mediterranean-like climate. Serve this moscato wine in chilled glasses alongside lightly sweet desserts like roasted pears, fruit tarts or even almond cake. The residual sugar of this white moscato is balanced out by its bright acidity, providing a delightful foil to sweet dishes. Bring out a bottle of this moscato wine when you want a bright and light finish to your meal. To get the most delicious taste, keep this white wine bottle refrigerated for at least 2 to 2 and a half hours before serving. Please enjoy our wines responsibly. � 2020 Woodbridge Winery, Acampo, CA USA
